articles.author: JAMES ROBSON
articles.title: Champions League final: Real Madrid seals 15th European Cup after 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund - The Associated Press
articles.description: Vinicius Junior has sealed a record-extending 15th European Cup for Real Madrid after a 2-0 win against Borussia Dortmund in the final in London. The Brazil forward doubled Madrid’s lead in the 83rd minute at Wembley Stadium after Dani Carvajal headed the Spa…
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) In an explosion of gold and silver confetti, Real Madrid held aloft the Champions League trophy for a record-extending 15th time on Saturday.
